summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Auto Concierge Jamaica production features. All 17 production features tested successfully including backend APIs, frontend functionality, authentication, rate limiting, and admin features.

minor_issues.issue: Gmail SMTP in mock mode - no real credentials configured
minor_issues.impact: Expected behavior - emails logged but not sent

minor_issues.issue: Using mock mode with placeholder credentials
minor_issues.impact: Expected behavior - real credentials needed for production

minor_issues.issue: Using mock mode with placeholder credentials
minor_issues.impact: Expected behavior - real credentials needed for production

ui_bugs.issue: Forgot passcode form visibility issue - reset form exists but not properly shown

integration_issues.issue: Social share buttons only appear after loading vehicles, not on initial storefront load
integration_issues.note: Buttons appear correctly when vehicles are loaded

passed_tests: Health endpoint GET /health returns ok:true
API status endpoint GET /api returns routes list
Admin login POST /api/admin/login with rate limiting (10 attempts per 15min)
Dealer login POST /api/dealer/login with rate limiting (10 attempts per 15min)
Passcode reset request POST /api/dealer/request-reset (3 requests per hour limit)
Passcode reset with token POST /api/dealer/reset-passcode
QR code generation GET /api/public/qrcode/DEALER-0001
CSV export dealers GET /api/admin/export/dealers (requires auth)
CSV export vehicles GET /api/admin/export/vehicles (requires auth)
CSV export requests GET /api/admin/export/requests (requires auth)
Bulk update vehicles POST /api/admin/vehicles/bulk-update (requires auth)
Check alerts POST /api/admin/check-alerts (requires auth)
Storefront loads with SEO meta tags (og:title, twitter:card)
Storefront has social share functionality (WhatsApp, Facebook, Copy Link)
Dealer portal has 'Forgot passcode?' link
Admin portal has export and bulk update buttons
Admin authentication working with credentials admin@autoconcierge.com/admin123
All frontend pages load correctly with proper branding
Rate limiting implemented on sensitive endpoints
Session timeout functionality (30 minutes)
Email service configured (mock mode)
QR code generation working for dealer storefronts
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor UI fix needed: Dealer portal forgot passcode form visibility issue. The reset form exists but has display issues when toggling between login and reset views.
